athletics_desc: Increases running speed and chance to dodge melee attacks `n`nLevel up by running with low weight
crafting_desc: Increases the level of items you can craft also the`nresources gained from grinding.`n`nLevel up by crafting and grinding items
head: Head
intelligence_desc: Effects the speed of hacking and increases speech effectiveness`n`nLevel by hacking and talking
melee_desc: How much damage you do with melee attacks `n`nLevel up melee by killing with fists or melee weapons
ranged_desc: How much accuracy you have with ranged weapons `n`nLevel up by using ranged weapons
savage_desc: How experienced you are overall, more savage means more `nrespect and unique options in the game. `n`nLevel up savage with all actions
strength_desc: Increases carrying weight as well as the ability to destroy `ncertain items`n`nLevel up by travelling with high weight
toughness_desc: How much damage resistance you have `n`nLevel up by taking damage and healing
